title: Trendnaissance 7/29: Beyonce, Shakira, Tony Pizza, Will Smith, Taylor Swift, Mrs. Ortega
itunes:title: Trendnaissance 7/29: Beyonce, Shakira, Tony Pizza, Will Smith, Taylor Swift, Mrs. Ortega
description:
In this edition of Trendaissance, Miles and super producers Becca and Joelle discuss the new Beyonce album, Shakira facing 8-years in jail for tax fraud, the "Tony Pizza" fiasco, the new Will Smith apology video, the list of the most polluting-est celebs, and a little educator appreciation!

DONATE: Mrs. Ortega's Amazon Wishlist

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
